title: Am I beeing unlucky? (bug ?)
body: Helly guys. I'm a new player, I started 2 weeks ago. Tonight, at around 10PM(Right Now its 1:13 AM here) I was really excited to acheive LVL 10 to finally play normal draft pick. To my suprise, I have not been able to play a single game yet due to the time queue. It says estimated time 3m46 seconds, but its been already 15 minutes now and I have restarded a few times already. Im just wondering if its a common thing or Im just beeing unlucky or there's a bug related to this right now???

replies.body:
Welcome to the Rift!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Sometimes it _can_ take a few minutes to find a match, but typically it's only because the system is trying to find other players that are around the same skill level that you are! Check out this [matchmaking guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide) for more in depth details on how our system matches you with others.

Thanks for the answer but still. I tried to play many times since im LVL 10 and I managed to play 1 game 5 vs 5 draft. It was in the afternoon. Even tonight I cant find a match after 10 minutes. What are the options if I want to lvl up to get to 30? Or its a problem related to my computer?
It's probly cuz it's 1 AM and most people don't play normal draft at your level.
